body:
This change adds support for building the hipblas-test client and teaches spack how to run the tests. The change is pretty similar to #26919. Though, these tests will run ~30 minutes.

To give it a spin, try:
```
spack install --verbose --test=root hipblas@4.3.1
```

@haampie @srekolam @arjun-raj-kuppala
title: hipblas: Add spack test support
